segments.text: I see the water gushing from the faucet, an endless flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost mesmerizing; I could watch it for hours.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I look down and see the puddle spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How did it get this far without anyone noticing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s concentrated on her dish, completely unaware; it’s infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this negligence could lead to a big mess, or even someone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there’s the boy, stretching dangerously to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little fingers just barely brushing the jar, while the girl waits eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They embody such mischief, so innocent yet so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only the woman would glance up, perhaps it would all be different.
segments.speaker: PAR
